 26namespace vsip

 29namespace impl

 31
 32/// Utility class to copy block data into/out-of of regular memory.
 33///
 34/// Template parameters:
 35///   :Dim:
 36///   :Block:    is a block type,
 37///   :Order:    is a dimension-ordering,
 38///   :PackType: is a packing type tag,
 39///   :CmplxFmt: is a complex storage format tag.
 40template <dimension_type Dim,
 41	  typename       Block,
 42	  typename       Order,
 43	  typename       PackType,
 44	  typename       CmplxFmt>
 45struct Block_copy_to_ptr
 46{
 47  typedef Applied_layout<Layout<Dim, Order, PackType, CmplxFmt> > LP;
 48  typedef Storage<CmplxFmt, typename Block::value_type> storage_type;
 49  typedef typename storage_type::type ptr_type;
 50
 51
 52  static void copy (Block* block, LP& layout, ptr_type data)
 53  {
 54    using namespace vsip::impl::profile;
 55    event<memory>("Block_copy_to_ptr::copy",
 56		  block->size() * sizeof(typename Block::value_type));
 57    Length<Dim> ext = extent<Dim>(*block);
 58    expr::evaluate(*block);
 59    for (Index<Dim> idx; valid(ext, idx); next(ext, idx))
 60      storage_type::put(data, layout.index(idx), get(*block, idx));
 61  }
 62};
 63
 64
 65
 66template <dimension_type Dim,
 67	  typename       Block,
 68	  typename       Order,
 69	  typename       PackType,
 70	  typename       CmplxFmt,
 71	  bool           Modifiable = Is_modifiable_block<Block>::value>
 72struct Block_copy_from_ptr
 73{
 74  typedef Applied_layout<Layout<Dim, Order, PackType, CmplxFmt> > LP;
 75  typedef Storage<CmplxFmt, typename Block::value_type> storage_type;
 76  typedef typename storage_type::type ptr_type;
 77
 78  static void copy(Block* block, LP& layout, ptr_type data)
 79  {
 80    using namespace vsip::impl::profile;
 81    event<memory>("Block_copy_from_ptr::copy",
 82		  block->size() * sizeof(typename Block::value_type));
 83    Length<Dim> ext = extent<Dim>(*block);
 84
 85    for (Index<Dim> idx; valid(ext, idx); next(ext, idx))
 86    {
 87      put(*block, idx, storage_type::get(data, layout.index(idx)));
 88    }
 89  }
 90};
 91
 92
 93
 94template <dimension_type Dim,
 95	  typename       Block,
 96	  typename       Order,
 97	  typename       PackType,
 98	  typename       CmplxFmt>
 99struct Block_copy_from_ptr<Dim, Block, Order, PackType, CmplxFmt, false>
100{
101  typedef Applied_layout<Layout<Dim, Order, PackType, CmplxFmt> > LP;
102  typedef Storage<CmplxFmt, typename Block::value_type> storage_type;
103  typedef typename storage_type::type ptr_type;
104
105  static void copy(Block*, LP&, ptr_type)
106  { assert(0); }
107};
108
109
110
111/// Implementation class to copy block data to pointer to regular memory,
112/// with layout determined at run-time.
113///
114/// Template parameters:
115///
116///   :Dim: is the dimension of the run-time layout.
117///   :Block: is a block type,
118///   :IsComplex: indicates whether the value type is complex
119///
120/// IsComplex is used to specialize the implementation so that functions
121/// can be overloaded for split and interleaved arguments.
122
123template <dimension_type Dim,
124	  typename       Block,
125	  bool           IsComplex>
126struct Rt_block_copy_to_ptr_impl;
127
128/// Specialization for blocks with complex value_types.
129template <dimension_type Dim,
130	  typename       Block>
131struct Rt_block_copy_to_ptr_impl<Dim, Block, true>
132{
133  typedef Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> > LP;
134
135  typedef Storage<Cmplx_inter_fmt, typename Block::value_type>
136	  inter_storage_type;
137  typedef Storage<Cmplx_split_fmt, typename Block::value_type>
138	  split_storage_type;
139
140  typedef typename inter_storage_type::type inter_ptr_type;
141  typedef typename split_storage_type::type split_ptr_type;
142
143  typedef Rt_pointer<typename Block::value_type> rt_ptr_type;
144
145  static void copy(Block* block, LP const& layout, inter_ptr_type data)
146  {
147    Length<Dim> ext = extent<Dim>(*block);
148
149    for (Index<Dim> idx; valid(ext, idx); next(ext, idx))
150      inter_storage_type::put(data, layout.index(idx), get(*block, idx));
151  }
152
153  static void copy(Block* block, LP const& layout, split_ptr_type data)
154  {
155    Length<Dim> ext = extent<Dim>(*block);
156
157    for (Index<Dim> idx; valid(ext, idx); next(ext, idx))
158      split_storage_type::put(data, layout.index(idx), get(*block, idx));
159  }
160
161  static void copy(Block* block, LP const& layout, rt_ptr_type data)
162  {
163    if (complex_format(layout) == cmplx_inter_fmt)
164      copy(block, layout, data.as_inter());
165    else
166      copy(block, layout, data.as_split());
167  }
168};
169
170/// Specialization for blocks with non-complex value_types.
171template <dimension_type Dim,
172	  typename       Block>
173struct Rt_block_copy_to_ptr_impl<Dim, Block, false>
174{
175  typedef Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> > LP;
176
177  typedef Storage<Cmplx_inter_fmt, typename Block::value_type>
178	  inter_storage_type;
179
180  typedef typename inter_storage_type::type inter_ptr_type;
181  typedef Rt_pointer<typename Block::value_type> rt_ptr_type;
182
183
184  static void copy(Block* block, LP const& layout, inter_ptr_type data)
185  {
186    Length<Dim> ext = extent<Dim>(*block);
187
188    for (Index<Dim> idx; valid(ext, idx); next(ext, idx))
189      inter_storage_type::put(data, layout.index(idx), get(*block, idx));
190  }
191
192  static void copy(Block* block, LP const& layout, rt_ptr_type data)
193  {
194    copy(block, layout, data.as_inter());
195  }
196
197};
198
199
200
201/// Implementation class to copy block data from pointer to regular memory,
202/// with layout determined at run-time.
203///
204/// Template parameters:
205///
206///   :Dim: is the dimension of the run-time layout.
207///   :Block: is a block type,
208///   :IsComplex: indicates whether the value type is complex
209///   :Modifiable: indicates whether the block is modifiable
210///
211/// IsComplex is used to specialize the implementation so that functions
212/// can be overloaded for split and interleaved arguments.
213///
214/// Modifiable is used to convert attempting to write to a
215/// non-modifiable block from a compile-time error to a run-time
216/// error.  This is necessary because Ext_data passes sync as
217/// a run-time parameter.
218template <dimension_type Dim,
219	  typename       Block,
220	  bool           IsComplex,
221	  bool           Modifiable = Is_modifiable_block<Block>::value>
222struct Rt_block_copy_from_ptr_impl;
223
224/// Specializations for blocks with complex value_types.
225template <dimension_type Dim,
226	  typename       Block>
227struct Rt_block_copy_from_ptr_impl<Dim, Block, true, true>
228{
229  typedef Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> > LP;
230
231  typedef Storage<Cmplx_inter_fmt, typename Block::value_type>
232	  inter_storage_type;
233  typedef Storage<Cmplx_split_fmt, typename Block::value_type>
234	  split_storage_type;
235
236  typedef typename inter_storage_type::type inter_ptr_type;
237  typedef typename split_storage_type::type split_ptr_type;
238
239  typedef Rt_pointer<typename Block::value_type> rt_ptr_type;
240
241  static void copy(Block* block, LP const& layout, inter_ptr_type data)
242  {
243    Length<Dim> ext = extent<Dim>(*block);
244
245    for (Index<Dim> idx; valid(ext, idx); next(ext, idx))
246      put(*block, idx, inter_storage_type::get(data, layout.index(idx)));
247  }
248
249  static void copy(Block* block, LP const& layout, split_ptr_type data)
250  {
251    Length<Dim> ext = extent<Dim>(*block);
252
253    for (Index<Dim> idx; valid(ext, idx); next(ext, idx))
254      put(*block, idx, split_storage_type::get(data, layout.index(idx)));
255  }
256
257  static void copy(Block* block, LP const& layout, rt_ptr_type data)
258  {
259    if (complex_format(layout) == cmplx_inter_fmt)
260      copy(block, layout, data.as_inter());
261    else
262      copy(block, layout, data.as_split());
263  }
264};
265
266
267/// Specialization for const blocks (with complex value type).
268///
269/// Non-modifiable blocks cannot be written to.  However, Ext_data and
270/// Rt_ext_data use a run-time value (sync) to determine if a block
271/// will be written.
272template <dimension_type Dim,
273	  typename       Block>
274struct Rt_block_copy_from_ptr_impl<Dim, Block, true, false>
275{
276  typedef Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> > LP;
277
278  typedef Rt_pointer<typename Block::value_type> rt_ptr_type;
279
280  static void copy(Block const*, LP const&, rt_ptr_type)
281  {
282    assert(false);
283  }
284};
285
286
287/// Specialization for blocks with non-complex value_types.
288template <dimension_type Dim,
289	  typename       Block>
290struct Rt_block_copy_from_ptr_impl<Dim, Block, false, true>
291{
292  typedef Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> > LP;
293
294  typedef Storage<Cmplx_inter_fmt, typename Block::value_type>
295	  inter_storage_type;
296
297  typedef typename inter_storage_type::type inter_ptr_type;
298  typedef Rt_pointer<typename Block::value_type> rt_ptr_type;
299
300  static void copy(Block* block, LP const& layout, inter_ptr_type data)
301  {
302    Length<Dim> ext = extent<Dim>(*block);
303
304    for (Index<Dim> idx; valid(ext, idx); next(ext, idx))
305      put(*block, idx, inter_storage_type::get(data, layout.index(idx)));
306  }
307
308  static void copy(Block* block, LP const& layout, rt_ptr_type data)
309  {
310    copy(block, layout, data.as_inter());
311  }
312};
313
314
315/// Specialization for const blocks (with non-complex value type).
316template <dimension_type Dim,
317	  typename       Block>
318struct Rt_block_copy_from_ptr_impl<Dim, Block, false, false>
319{
320  typedef Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> > LP;
321
322  typedef Rt_pointer<typename Block::value_type> rt_ptr_type;
323
324  static void copy(Block const*, LP const&, rt_ptr_type)
325  {
326    assert(false);
327  }
328};
329
330
331
332/// Utility classes to copy block data to/from a pointer to regular memory,
333/// with layout determined at run-time.
334///
335/// Template parameters:
336///   :Dim: is the dimension of the run-time layout,
337///   :Block: is a block type.
338template <dimension_type Dim,
339	  typename       Block>
340struct Rt_block_copy_to_ptr
341  : Rt_block_copy_to_ptr_impl<Dim, Block,
342		    vsip::impl::Is_complex<typename Block::value_type>::value>
343{};
344
345template <dimension_type Dim,
346	  typename       Block>
347struct Rt_block_copy_from_ptr
348  : Rt_block_copy_from_ptr_impl<Dim, Block,
349		    vsip::impl::Is_complex<typename Block::value_type>::value>
350{};
